name: Save training results from Strava to Google sheets
description:
Every time you end a training information on your results is added to your Google sheets spreadsheet from your Strava.
In order for this scenario to work your sheet has to look like [this](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Gg9KneI9z1KWF27uleItAAkK3EoOm-gKIhNOeNvV6_I/edit?usp=sharing)
